en: Abstract of disbursements made by Return J. Meigs, 1812 Nov. 14 - 1812 Dec. 1, Tennessee

This is a summary of the disbursements made by Return J. Meigs, U.S. Agent to the Cherokee Nation, at the Cherokee Agency in Tennessee from November 14, 1812 through December 1, 1812. The expenses include salary payments to various interpreters, payment for claims against the Cherokees, legal fees, transportation costs, and payment for spinning and weaving articles.
